user_profile: User 188 is an extroverted adult male, likely in his late 20s or early 30s, who has completed college and belongs to a middle socioeconomic class. His lifestyle reflects a vibrant social life, characterized by frequent visits to bars, theaters, and performing arts venues, indicating a preference for nightlife and entertainment. He is health-conscious, regularly attending the gym and maintaining a fitness routine. This balance of socializing and fitness suggests a conscientious personality, as he values his physical wellbeing. User 188 is open to new experiences, often exploring different food options, including seafood and burrito places. His experiences in university settings further indicate a pursuit of knowledge and development. Regular visits to art museums suggest a refined taste for culture. Based on his visit patterns, important future locations may include more universities, popular bars (POI id 213), fitness centers (POI id 137), and theaters (POI id 86).
